article_title: The worst on-air technical malfunction evah? « The Greenroom
article_text:
The worst on-air technical malfunction evah?

posted at 1:21 pm on February 21, 2014 by Ed Morrissey

For those of you who watch The Ed Morrissey Show, perhaps not — but at least my entire technical staff consists of me. For Chicago’s WGN, they may as well have had me as their technical staff:

Recently in the Green Room:
